testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlSectionSignalTimingPatternInventorySubscription dialog as an EC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.10.19 [Need to Share Section Timing Patterns] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Publish Section Timing Pattern Information (NTRM 3.3.5.11.15.2}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N104R1142_Publish_Section_Timing_Pattern_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N104R1142_Publish_Section_Timing_Pattern_Information_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Subscribe to Section Timing Pattern Information (NTRM 3.3.5.11.15.3}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N104R1143_Subscribe_to_Section_Timing_Pattern_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N104R1143_Subscribe_to_Section_Timing_Pattern_Information_Parameter}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Authentication - Device Information (DeviceAuth) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R366_Authentication___Device_Information__DeviceAuth__Supported = ${TMDD_N104R366_Authentication___Device_Information__DeviceAuth__Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier - Device Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.2.1.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R367_Operator_Identifier___Device_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R367_Operator_Identifier___Device_Information_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether External Center Organization - Device Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R368_External_Center_Organization___Device_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R368_External_Center_Organization___Device_Information_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R369_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R369_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R370_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R370_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R371_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R371_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R372_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R372_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R373_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R373_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Section Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R374_Section_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R374_Section_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Pattern Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R375_Pattern_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R375_Pattern_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Center Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R376_Center_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R376_Center_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Time Range Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R377_Time_Range_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R377_Time_Range_Filter_Supported}
Step 17 CONFIGURE: Define the publication message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationMessage: ${PublicationMessage}
Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be performed within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationCount: ${PublicationCount}
Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 22 CONFIGURE: Identify the Username expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Username: ${Username}
Step 23 CONFIGURE: Identify the Password expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Password: ${Password}
Step 24 CONFIGURE: Identify the Operator Identifier expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: OperatorID: ${OperatorID}
Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}
Step 28 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionResponseMessage: ${SubscriptionResponseMessage}

Step 29 SUBSCRIPTION-OC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlSectionSignalTimingPatternInventorySubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED= AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck USERNAME = Username PASSWORD = Password OPERATORID = OperatorID ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 30 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 30.1 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header
Step 30.2 VERIFY that a device-type data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header
Step 30.3 VERIFY that a device-information-type data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header
Step 30.4 IF TMDD_N104R366_Authentication___Device_Information__DeviceAuth__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.4.1 VERIFY that an authentication data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header
Step 30.5 IF TMDD_N104R367_Operator_Identifier___Device_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.5.1 VERIFY that an operator-id data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header.authentication
Step 30.6 IF TMDD_N104R368_External_Center_Organization___Device_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.6.1 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header
Step 30.7 IF TMDD_N104R369_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.7.1 VERIFY that a device-id-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header.device-filter
Step 30.8 IF TMDD_N104R370_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.8.1 VERIFY that a network-id-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header.device-filter
Step 30.9 IF TMDD_N104R371_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.9.1 VERIFY that a link-id-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header.device-filter
Step 30.10 IF TMDD_N104R372_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.10.1 VERIFY that a link-designator-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header.device-filter
Step 30.11 IF TMDD_N104R373_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.11.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header.device-filter
Step 30.12 IF TMDD_N104R374_Section_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.12.1 VERIFY that a section-id-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header.device-filter
Step 30.13 IF TMDD_N104R375_Pattern_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.13.1 VERIFY that a pattern-id-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header.device-filter
Step 30.14 IF TMDD_N104R376_Center_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.14.1 VERIFY that a center-id-list data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header.device-filter
Step 30.15 IF TMDD_N104R377_Time_Range_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.15.1 VERIFY that a time-range data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequestMsg.device-information-request-header.device-filter
Step 30.16 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 30.17 CONFIGURE: Set CONTENTVERIFIED to True

Step 30.18 POSTCONDITION: SUBSCRIPTION-OC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlSectionSignalTimingPatternInventorySubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED= CONTENTVERIFIED = CONTENTVERIFIED SUBSCRIPTIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = SubscriptionResponseMessage

Step 30.19 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note:If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 30.19.1 PUBLICATION-OC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlSectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N104R1142_Publish_Section_Timing_Pattern_Information_Parameter PUBLICATIONMESSAGE = PublicationMessage PUBLICATIONCOUNT = PublicationCount PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 30.19.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 30.19.2.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 30.19.2.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 30.19.2.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 30.19.2.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 30.19.2.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 30.19.2.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to PublicationErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 30.19.2.7 IF TMDD_N104R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 30.19.2.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 31 EXIT
